Translations.Text: Kasone, ki ʙa didori Mo [dar oxirat] umed nadorand, guftand: «Caro faristagone ʙar mo nozil nasudaand, jo [caro] Parvardigoramonro nameʙinem»? Be tardid, onon dar ʙorai xud takaʙʙur varzidand va sarkasii ʙuzurg kardand
Ruze, ki [kofiron] faristagonro meʙinand, hec ʙasorate ʙaroi mucrimon naxohad ʙud, [ʙalki ruzi kajfaru azoʙ ast] va [faristagon] megujand: «[Bihist] Bar sumo mamnu' [va harom] ast»
Va ʙa [ʙarrasii] korhojason mepardozem va hamaro [hamcun] ƣuʙore parokanda mesozem
Dar on ruz ʙihistijon ʙehtarin cojgohu nakutarin istirohatgohro dorand
Va [jod kun az] ruze, ki osmon ʙo aʙrhoi saped sikofta mesavad va faristagon [pajopaj ʙa sarzamini mahsar] furu firistoda mesavand
Dar on ruz farmonravoi [-i rostin] az oni [Allohi] Rahmon ast va ʙaroi kofiron ruze dusvor ast
Va [jod kun az] ruze, ki sitamgor dastonasro [az hasrat] megazad va megujad: «Ej kos, man rohe [hamohang] ʙo pajomʙar ʙarguzida ʙudam
Ej voj ʙar man! Ej kos, falon [kofir]-ro ʙa dusti namegiriftam
Be tardid, pas az on ki Qur'on [va da'vati pajomʙar] ʙa man rasid, u [ʙud, ki] maro ʙa gumrohi kasond va sajton hamvora insonro tanho [va xor] vomeguzorad»
Va Pajomʙar guft: «Parvardigoro, qavmi man in Qur'onro raho kardaand»
Va incunin ʙaroi har pajomʙare dusmane az ʙadkoroni [qavmas] qaror dodem. Va kofi ast, ki Parvardigorat rohnamo va jovarat ʙosad

Va kasone, ki kufr varzidand, guftand: «Caro Qur'on jakʙora ʙar u nozil nasudaast?» Mo in guna [kalomi ilohiro ʙa murur nozil] kardaem, to dilatro ʙo on [orom va] ustuvor gardonem va onro ʙa tadric ʙar tu xondaem [to darku hifzas oson ʙosad]
Va [kofiron] hec [e'tirozu] masale ʙarojat nameovarand, magar on ki Mo [niz posuxe] ʙar haq va xusʙajontar ʙarojat meovarem
Kasone, ki ʙa ruj daraftoda ʙa duzax kasonda mesavand, inon ʙadcojgohtar va gumrohtarand
Va dar haqiqat, Mo ʙa Muso kitoʙ [Tavrot] dodem va ʙarodaras Horunro dastjoras soxtem
Va guftem: «Sumo du nafar ʙa sui qavme ʙiraved, ki ojoti Moro duruƣ angostand». Pas, [cun fir'avnijon sarpeci namudand] ʙa siddat noʙudason soxtem
Va qavmi Nuhro – on goh ki pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand – ƣarq kardem va ononro ʙaroi mardum [nisona va] iʙrate qaror dodem; va ʙaroi sitamgoron azoʙe dardnok muhajjo kardaem
Va [hamcunin] qavmi Od va Samud va aholii "coh" va naslhoi ʙisjorero, ki ʙajni onon ʙudand [noʙud soxtem]
Va ʙaroi har jak az onho masalho zadem va [cun pand nagiriftand] hamaro ʙa siddat az mijon ʙurdem

Va [musrikon] hatman, az [sarzamini qavmi Lut hamon] sahre, ki ʙoroni ʙalo ʙar on ʙorida ʙud, guzar kardaand. Ojo on [vajronahoi ʙoqimonda az azoʙ] -ro nadidaand? [Cunin nest] Balki ʙa zinda sudan [pas az marg] umede nadorand
Va hangome ki turo meʙinand, faqta ʙa tamasxur megirand [va megujand] «Ojo in hamon kasest, ki Alloh taolo ʙa pajomʙari firistodaast

Agar ʙar [parastisi] ma'ʙudonamon [sikeʙoi va] pojdori namekardem, nazdik ʙud [Muhammad] az [rohi] onho gumrohamon kunad». Vale on goh ki azoʙ [-i ilohi]-ro ʙuʙinand, xohand donist ci kase gumrohtar [ʙuda] ast
Ojo kase, ki havoi nafsasro ma'ʙudi xud kardaast, didai? Ojo tu [metavoni] nigahʙoni [imoni] u ʙosi
Ojo gumon dori, ki ʙestarason mesunavand jo mefahmand? Onon cuz hammonandi cahorpojon nestand, ʙalki gumrohtarand

Ojo [ofarinisi] Parvardigoratro nadidai, ki ci guna sojaro gustaronidaast va agar mexost, onro soʙit menamud? On goh [taƣjiri cojgohi] xursed [nisʙat ʙa zamin]-ro daleli [gustarisu harakati] on [soja] qaror dodem
Sipas [ʙo taƣjiri ʙalandii xursed sojaro kutoh mekunem va] onro andak-andak ʙa suji xes ʙozmegirem
Va Ust, ki saʙro [ʙo torikii farogiras] pusise ʙaroi sumo qaror dod va xoʙro mojai osois va ruzro hangomi ʙarxostan [va koru talos] soxt
Va Ust, ki pes az [ʙoroni] rahmatas ʙodhoro ʙasoratʙaxs firistod va az osmon oʙe pok [va pokkunanda] furu firistodem
To ʙo on sarzamini [xusku] murdaro zinda gardonem va cahorpojon va insonhoi ʙisjorero, ki ofaridaem, seroʙ sozem
Va ʙa rosti, on [daloilu nisonahoi qudrati ilohi]-ro ʙa surathoi gunogun ʙajon kardem, to pand girand, vale ʙestar mardum cuz [inkoru] nosiposi nakardand
Va agar mexostem, dar har dijore ʙimdihandae ʙarmeangextem
Pas, [ej pajomʙar] az kofiron itoat nakun va ʙa vasilai Qur'on ʙo onon ʙa cihodi ʙuzurge ʙarxez [va dar in roh sikeʙo ʙos]
Va Ust, ki du darjoro ʙa ham omext: in jake xusguvor va sirin ast va on jake suru talx va dar mijoni on du moneai nufuznopazire qaror dod [to ʙo ham najomezand]
Va Ust, ki insonro az oʙi [mani] ofarid va uro doroi pajvandi nasaʙi va saʙaʙi gardonid va Parvardigorat hamvora tavonost
Va [musrikon] ʙa coji Alloh taolo cizero meparastand, ki na ʙa onon sude meʙaxsad va na zijone merasonad va kofir dar ʙaroʙari Parvardigoras pajvasta pustiʙon [-i sajton] ast
Va [ej pajomʙar] Mo turo cuz ʙasoratʙaxs va ʙimdihanda nafiristodem
Bigu: «Man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham, magar kase, ki ʙixohad rohe ʙa sui Parvardigoras ʙarguzinad [va hamin ʙarojam kofi ast]»
Va ʙar [Parvardigori] zindae, ki hargiz namemirad, tavakkal kun va ʙo citois Uro ʙa poki jod kun. Va hamin ʙas, ki U ʙa gunohoni ʙandagonas ogoh ast

[Hamon] Kase, ki osmonho va zamin va on ciro mijoni onhost dar sas ruz ofarid, sipas ʙar Ars qaror girift. [U Allohi] Rahmon ast, pas, dar mavridi U az on ki ogoh ast, ʙipurs [va U niz kase cuz Alloh taolo nest]

Va hangome ki ʙa ʙa onon gufta savad: «Baroi [Allohi] Rahmon sacda kuned», megujand: «Rahmon kist? Ojo [qaror ast] ʙar har ci tu amr mekuni sacda ʙarem»? Va [in da'vati tu duri az haq va] nafratasonro meafzojad
Purʙarakat [va ʙuzurgvor] ast, on ki dar osmon manzilgohhoe [ʙaroi sitoragon] qaror dod va dar [mijoni] onho xursed [-i duraxson] va mohi toʙone padid ovard
Va Ust, ki saʙu ruzro dar paji jakdigar qaror dod, ʙaroi har ki ʙixohad [az tadʙiri ilohi] pand girad jo siposguzor ʙosad

Va ʙandagoni [mu'minu soistai] Rahmon kasone hastand, ki ʙo furutani [va matonat] ʙar zamin roh meravand va hangome ki cohilon [ʙo suxanoni nopisand] xitoʙason mekunand, [ʙa coi talofi ʙo onon] ʙa neki suxan megujand
Va kasone ʙaroi Parvardigorason dar holi sacda va qijom saʙzindadori mekunand
Va kasone, ki megujand: «Parvardigoro, azoʙi duzaxro az mo ʙozgardon, [ki] ʙe tardid, azoʙas [saxtu] pojdor ast
Haqqo, ki duzax ʙad cojgoh va iqomatgohest
Va [mu'minon] kasone hastand, ki cun infoq menamojand, na zijodaravi mekunand va na saxtgiri va ʙajni in du [holat rohi] e'tidol pes megirand

Va kasone hastand, ki ʙo Alloh taolo ma'ʙude digar namexonand va kase, ki Alloh taolo [kustanasro] harom kardaast, cuz ʙa haq namekusand va zino namekunand. Va har ki in [gunohon]-ro murtakiʙ savad, kajfari gunohi [xes]-ro meʙinad
Ruzi qijomat azoʙas ducandon megardad va ʙo xori dar on [azoʙ] covidon memonad
Magar kase, ki tavʙa kunad va imon ovarad va kore soista ancom dihad. Pas, inonand, ki Alloh taolo ʙadihojasonro ʙa nekiho taʙdil mekunad va Alloh taolo hamvora omurzgoru mehruʙon ast
Va kase, ki tavʙa kunad va kore soista ancom dihad, pas, jaqinan ʙa dargohi Alloh taolo – cunon ki ʙojadu sojad – tavʙa kardaast

Va kasone [mu'minand], ki guvohii duruƣ namedihand [va dar macolisi ʙotil huzur namejoʙand] va cun ʙa [kori nopisand jo] ʙehudae ʙarxurd mekunand, ʙuzurgvorona [az kanoras] meguzarand [va xudro oluda namesozand]
Va kasone, ki cun ʙa ojoti Parvardigorason pand doda mesavand, [az on ƣaflat namekunand va dar ʙaroʙari Qur'on] cun karonu kuron nestand
Va kasone, ki megujand: «Parvardigoro, az hamsaronu farzandonamon [kasonero] ʙa mo ato farmo, ki [mojai sodii dilho va] ravsanii casmho ʙosand va moro pesvoi parhezkoron qaror ʙideh»
[Ore] Inon ʙa posi on ki sikeʙoi kardaand, manozil [-i olii ʙihist]-ro podos megirand va dar on co ʙo durudu salomi [faristagon] ru ʙa ru megardand
Dar on co covidonand. Ci naku cojgoh va [ci nek] iqomatgohe ast

[Ba kofiron] ʙigu: «Agar iʙodat va duojaton naʙosad, Parvardigoram e'tinoe ʙa sumo nadorad [va arzise ʙarojaton qoil nest]. Ba rosti, sumo [da'vati haqro] duruƣ angosted, pas, ʙa zudi [kajfari in kor] gireʙongiraton xohad sud
To, sin, mim
In ojoti kitoʙi ravsangar ast
Sojad mexohi az [anduhi] in ki [musrikon] imon nameovarand, xudro halok kuni
Agar ʙixohem, az osmon nisonae ʙar onon nozil mekunem, ki dar ʙaroʙaras ʙo furutani sar furud ovarand
Va hec pandi tozae az sui [Allohi] Rahmon ʙaroi onon nameojad, magar in ki az on ruj gardonand
Ba rosti, onon [da'vati pajomʙaron va azoʙi qijomatro] duruƣ angostand, pas, ʙa zudi axʙori on ci masxara mekardand, ʙa eson xohad rasid
Ojo ʙa zamin namenigarand, ki ci ʙisjor az har guna [gijohi] sudmande dar on rujonidaem
Be tardid, dar in [ofarinis] nisonae [az qudrati Alloh taolo ʙar meod] ast, vale ʙestarason imon nameovarand
Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
Va [jod kun az] hangome ki Parvardigorat Musoro nido dod, ki: «Ba suji qavmi sitamgor ʙirav
– qavmi Fir'avn - [va ʙa onon ʙigu] ojo [az kufru sarkasi] nameparhezand?»
[Muso] Guft: «Parvardigoro, ʙim doram, ki maro duruƣgu angorand
Va [az kufrason nosikeʙo va] ƣamgin gardam. Pas, [Caʙrailro] ʙa suji Horun ʙifrist [to ʙaroi joriam rahsiporas kunad]
Va onon [ʙa gumoni xes qasosi] gunohe ʙar man dorand, pas, metarsam, ki maro ʙikusand»
[Alloh taolo] Farmud: «Hargiz! Pas ʙo ojot [va mu'cizot]-i Mo ʙiraved. Jaqinan, [hama co] ʙo sumoem va [guftugujatonro] mesunavem
Pas, nazdi Fir'avn ʙiraved va ʙigued: «Mo firistodai Parvardigori cahonijon hastem
[U mefarmojad] Ki Bani Isroilro hamrohi mo ʙifirist»
[Fir'avn] guft: «Ojo turo dar kudaki mijoni xes parvaris nadodem va solhoe az umratro ʙajni mo naʙudi
Va kori xudro – cunon ki xosti – kardi [va on mardi qiʙtiro kusti] va tu [nisʙat ʙa ne'mathoi man] nosiposi?!»
[Muso] guft: «Man on [kor]-ro zamone ancom dodam, ki gumroh ʙudam
Pas, cun az sumo tarsidam, firor kardam. On goh Parvardigoram ʙa man donis ʙaxsid va maro az pajomʙaron qaror dod
Va in [ci] ne'matest, ki tu ʙar man minnat meguzori, ki Bani Isroilro ʙardai xud soxtai?!»
Fir'avn guft: «Parvardigori cahonijon kist?»
[Muso] Guft: «Parvardigori osmonho va zamin va on ci mijoni onhost. Agar ahli jaqin hasted [tanho uro ʙiparasted]»
[Fir'avn] Ba kasone, ki dar atrofas ʙudand [ʙo tamasxur] guft: «Ojo mesunaved [ci megujad]?»
[Muso] Guft: «[Alloh taolo] Parvardigori sumo va Parvardigori nijogoni sumost
[Fir'avn] Guft: «In pajomʙaraton, ki ʙa suji sumo firistoda sudaast, jaqinan devona ast»
[Muso] Guft: «Agar ʙiandesed, [xohed donist, ki U] Parvardigori masriq va maƣriʙ ast va har on ci mijoni on du qaror dorad»
[Fir'avn] Guft: «Agar ma'ʙude cuz man ʙarguzini, hatman, zindonat mekunam»
[Muso] Guft: «Hatto agar nisonai oskore [dar mavridi risolatam] ʙarojat ovarda ʙosam?»
[Fir'avn] Guft: «Agar rost megui, onro ʙijovar»
Pas, [Muso] asoi xudro andoxt, nogahon [taʙdil ʙa] aƶdahoe oskor sud
Va dastasro [az gireʙon] ʙerun ovard va nogoh dar nazari ʙinandagon saped [-u ravsan] ʙud
[Fir'avn] ʙa ʙuzurgoni peromunas guft: «Haqqo, ki in [mard] codugari donost
[U] Mexohad, ʙo codujas sumoro az sarzaminaton ʙerun kunad, pas, nazaraton cist?»
Onon guftand: «[Tasmim dar ʙorai mucozoti] u va ʙarodarasro ʙa ta'xir andoz va ma'muroni cam'ovari [corzanandagon]-ro ʙa [hamai] sahrho ʙifirist
to har codugari mohir [va] donoero nazdat ʙijovarand»
Pas, [cunin kardand va sarancom] codugaron ʙaroi va'dagohi ruzi muajjan gird ovarda sudand
Va ʙa mardum gufta sud: «Ojo sumo [niz] cam' mesaved, to [ʙuʙinem ʙaranda kist]
Agar codugaron piruz sudand, [hamagi] az onon pajravi kunem»
Pas, vaqte codugaron omadand, ʙa Fir'avn guftand: «Agar mo piruz savem, ojo podose xohem dost»
U guft: «Ore, dar on surat, hatman, az nazdikonam xohed ʙud»
Muso ʙa onon guft: «Har ci [mexohed] ʙiafkaned, [aknun] ʙiafkaned»
Pas, onon resmonho va asohojasonro afkandand va guftand: «Ba izzati Fir'avn savgand, ki mo, hatman, piruzem»
Sipas Muso asojasro afkand, nogahon [taʙdil ʙa aƶdahoe sud va] on ciro, ki ʙa duruƣ soxta ʙudand, ʙal'id [furu ʙurd]
Pas, codugaron ʙa sacda daraftodand
[Va] Guftand: «Mo ʙa Parvardigori cahonijon imon ovardem
Parvardigori Muso va Horun»

[Fir'avn] Guft: «Ojo pes az on ki ʙa sumo icozat diham, ʙa u imon ovarded? Be tardid, u hamon ʙuzurgi sumost, ki ʙa sumo codu omuxtaast. Pas, ʙa zudi xohed donist [ki mucozotaton cist]. Jaqinan, dastho va pojhojatonro ʙar'aks [-i jakdigar az capu rost] qat' mekunam va hamagiatonro ʙa dor meovezam»
Onon guftand: «[Dar in sikanca va azoʙ] Hec zijone nest. Be tardid, mo ʙa suji Parvardigoramon ʙozmegardem
Umed dorem, ki Parvardigoramon gunohoni moro ʙuʙaxsad, ki mo naxustin kasone hastem, ki [az in qavm ʙa Parvardigori Muso] imon ovardem»
Va ʙa Muso vahj kardem, ki: «Bandagonamro saʙona [az Misr] ʙerun ʙiʙar; [zero sipohi Fir'avn] hatman, ʙa dunʙolaton xohad omad»
Pas Fir'avn [cun az mocaro ogoh gardid] ma'muroni cam'ovari [neru]-ro ʙa sahrho firistod
[Va e'lon kard] Inho [Bani Isroil] iddai nocizand
Va ciddan moro ʙa xasm ovardaand
Va mo hamagi komilan [husjoru] omodai pajkorem»
Pas, ononro az ʙoƣho va casmaho [-i sarzamini Misr] ʙerun ovardem
Va az gancho va xonahoi mucallal [dur soxtem]
Incunin [kardem] va Bani Isroilro vorisi on [sarvatu doroi] kardem
Pas, [sipohi Fir'avn] hangomi tului oftoʙ ʙa ta'qiʙi onon pardoxtand
Va cun du guruh jakdigarro didand, joroni Muso guftand: «Hatman, [dar cangoli fir'avnijon] giriftorem»
[Muso] Guft: «Hargiz! Be tardid, Parvardigoram ʙo man ast va maro [ʙa rohi nacot] hidojat xohad kard»
Pas, ʙa Muso vahj kardem: «Asojatro ʙa darjo ʙizan», pas, [Nil] sikofta sud va har ʙaxse [az on] hamcun kuhe ʙuzurg gast
Va on guruhi digar [sipohi Fir'avn]-ro ʙa on co kasondem
Va Muso va hamai kasonero, ki hamrohas ʙudand, nacot dodem
Va digaronro ƣarq namudem
Hatman, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast, vale ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
[Ej pajomʙar] Dostoni Iʙrohimro ʙar onon ʙozgu
Hangome ki ʙa padar va qavmas guft: «Ci cizro meparasted?»
Onon guftand: «Buthoero meparastem va pajvasta sar ʙar ostonason dorem»
[Iʙrohim] Guft: «Ojo vaqte onhoro mexoned, [sadoi] sumoro mesunavand
Jo ʙa sumo sudu zijon merasonand?»
Onon guftand: «[Na] Vale padaronamonro joftem, ki cunin mekardand»
[Iʙrohim] guft: «Ojo dided [va donisted] cizhoero, ki hamvora meparastided
[ham] sumo va [ham] padaronaton –
jaqinan, [hamai] onho dusmani [aqidai tavhidii] man hastand. Magar Parvardigori cahonijon
On [ma'ʙude], ki maro ofarida va hidojatam mekunad
Va hamone, ki ʙa man ƣizo medihad va seroʙam mesozad
Va hangome ki ʙemor mesavam, Ust, ki sifojam medihad
Va kase, ki maro memironad va [duʙora] zindaam mekunad
Va kase, ki umed doram ruzi cazo gunohonamro ʙuʙaxsad
Parvardigoro, ʙa man donise [dar din] ʙuʙaxs va maro ʙa soistagon mulhaq kun
Va ʙarojam dar ojandagon ovozai nek qaror ʙideh
Va maro az vorisoni ʙihisti purne'mat ʙigardon
Va padaramro ʙijomurz, [ki] ʙe tardid, dar zumrai gumrohon ʙud
Va ruze, ki [mardum] ʙarangexta mesavand, maro rasvo [va sarmanda] nasoz
Hamon ruze, ki molu farzandon sude nameʙaxsand
Magar kase, ki ʙo qalʙi pok [va xoli az sirku nifoq va rijo] ʙa pesgohi Alloh taolo ʙijojad»
Va [on ruz] ʙihist ʙaroi parhezkoron nazdik megardad
Va duzax ʙaroi gumrohon oskor mesavad
Va ʙa onon gufta mesavad: «On ci ʙa coi Alloh taolo meparastided, [aknun] kuco hastand
Ojo [onho dar ʙaroʙari azoʙi ilohi] joriaton mekunand jo [hatto xud]-ro jori medihand?»
Pas, onho [ʙutho] hamrohi gumrohon dar on [otasi havlangez] afkanda mesavand
Va [hamrohi] tamomi laskarijoni Iʙlis
Dar on co [musrikon] dar holi sitez [ʙo ma'ʙudoni ʙotil] megujand
«Ba Alloh taolo savgand, ki mo dar gumrohii oskore ʙudem»
On goh ki sumoro ʙo Parvardigori cahonijon ʙaroʙar medonistem
Va moro kase cuz mucrimon gumroh nakard
Pas, [aknun] na hec safoatgare dorem
Va na hec dusti mehruʙone
Pas, kos ʙozgaste [ʙa dunjo] dostem va dar zumrai mu'minon qaror megiriftem»
Hatman, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast, vale ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
Qavmi Nuh pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
On goh ki ʙarodarason Nuh ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned?»
Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙari amin hastam
Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed»
Onon guftand: «Ojo ʙa tu imon ʙijovarem, dar hole ki [faqat] furumojagon] az tu pajravi kardaand?»
[Nuh] Guft: «Man ʙa on ci onon [dar guzasta] mekardand, ci donise doram
Hisoʙi onon tanho ʙo Parvardigori man ast. Agar mefahmed [cunin suxani gazofe nagued]
Va man [hargiz] mu'minonro tard [dur] namekunam
Man cuz ʙimdihandai oskor nestam»
Onon guftand: «Ej Nuh, agar [az da'vatat] dast ʙarnadori, hatman, sangsor mesavi»
U guft: «Parvardigoro, qavmam maro duruƣgu angostand
Pas, mijoni manu eson dovari kun va maro va mu'minonero, ki hamroham hastand, nacot ʙideh»
Pas, u va afrodero, ki hamrohas ʙudand, dar [on] kistii oganda [ pur az insonu hajvon] nacot dodem
Va ʙoqimondagonro ƣarq kardem
Hatman, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast, vale ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
[Qavmi] Od pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
On goh ki ʙarodarason Hud ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned?”
Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙari amin hastam
Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
Ojo ʙar har makoni ʙalande ʙinoe ʙehuda mesozed
Va qasrho va qal'ahoi muhkamu ustuvor ʙino mekuned, guijo [dar dunjo] covidonaed
Va cun [ʙa kase] hamlavar mesaved, [ʙerahm va] zolimona hamla mekuned
Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
Va az kase parvo kuned, ki ʙa sumo [ne'mathoe cunon farovon] ato kardaast, ki xud [onhoro ʙehtar] medoned
U ʙa sumo cahorpojonu farzandon [-i ʙisjor] ato kardaast
Va ʙoƣho va casmasorho
Ba rosti, ki man az azoʙi ruzi ʙuzurg ʙar sumo metarsam”
Onon guftand: “Ci moro pand ʙidihi, jo nadihi, ʙarojamon jakson ast [va az tu toat namekunem]
In [oini mo hamon] ravisi pesinijon ast
va mo [hargiz] azoʙ naxohem sud»
Pas, onon Hudro duruƣgu angostand. Pas, Mo [niz] halokason kardem. Hatman, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
[Qavmi] Samud pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
On goh ki ʙarodarason Soleh ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned
Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙari amin hastam
Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed
Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
Ojo [mepindored, ki] sumoro dar ne'mathoe, ki in cost, osuda raho mekunand
Dar [in] ʙoƣho va casmasorho
Va [dar kanori in] kistzorho va naxlhoe, ki mevahojas narmu rasidaast
Va mohirona az kuhho [ʙaroi xud] xonahoe metarosed
Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed»
Va az isrofkoron [-i gunahgor] pajravi nakuned
[Hamon] Kasone, ki dar zamin ʙa fasod mepardozand va [xestanro] isloh namekunand”
Onon guftand: “[Ej Soleh] Cuz in nest, ki tu codusudai
Tu cuz ʙasare hammonandi mo nesti, pas, agar rost megui, nisonae [ʙar pajomʙariat] ʙijovar”
[Soleh] Guft: «In modasuturest, ki sahme az oʙ [-i casma] dorad va [ruzhoi muajjane niz] sumo sahme az oʙ dored
Pas, [kamtarin] ozore ʙa on narasoned, ki azoʙi ruzi ʙuzurg sumoro faro megirad”
Pas, onro [zaxmi kardand va] kustand va [on goh az kardai xud] pusajmon sudand
Pas, azoʙ [-i ilohi] ononro furu girift. Be gumon, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
Qavmi Lut [niz] pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
On goh ki ʙarodarason Lut ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned
Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙare amin hastam
Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed»
Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
Az mardumi cahon ʙo mardon meomezed
va hamsaronero, ki Alloh taolo ʙarojaton ofaridaast, raho mekuned? Balki sumo guruhi mutacovized
Onon guftand: «Ej Lut, agar [az in amru nahj] dast ʙarnadori, hatman, [az sahr] ixroc mesavi»
[Lut] Guft: «Man dusmani [sarsaxti] in koraton hastam
Parvardigoro, man va xonavodaamro az [oqiʙati] on ci [inho] ancom medihand, nacot deh»
Pas, mo u va hamai xonavodaasro nacot dodem
Magar pirazane, ki dar mijoni ʙozmondagon [dar azoʙ] ʙud
Sipas digaronro noʙud kardem
Va ʙar onon ʙorone [az sang] ʙoronidem va ʙoroni ʙimdodasudagon ci ʙad ʙud
Be gumon, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
Ashoʙi Ajka [niz] pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
On goh ki Suajʙ ʙa onon guft: «Ojo [az Alloh taolo] parvo namekuned
Ba rosti, man ʙaroi sumo pajomʙare amin hastam
Pas, az Alloh taolo parvo kuned [ʙitarsed] va mutei [dasturhoi] man ʙosed»
Va man [dar ʙaroʙari risolatam] hec podose az sumo namexoham. Podosi man tanho ʙar [uhdai] Parvardigori cahonijon ast
Pajmonaro tamom ʙidihed va kamfurusi nakuned
Va ʙo tarozui durust vazn kuned
Va koloi mardumro kam nadihed [va haqqasonro zoe' nakuned] va dar zamin ʙa fasod [va taʙohi] nakused
Va az kase, ki sumo va ummathoi pesinro ofarid, parvo kuned [ʙitarsed]
Onon guftand: «[Ej Suajʙ] Cuz in nest, ki tu codusudai
Tu cuz ʙasare hammonandi mo nesti va mo turo duruƣgu mepindorem
Pas, agar rost megui, porae az osmonro ʙar [sari] mo ʙiandoz»
[Suajʙ] Guft: «Parvardigoram ʙa on ci mekuned, donotar ast»
Pas, uro duruƣgu angostand va azoʙi ruzi aʙr [-i otasʙor] ononro faro girift. Ba rosti, ki on [ʙoroni otas] azoʙi ruzi havlnoke ʙud
Be gumon, dar in [mocaro] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast; va ʙestarason mu'min naʙudand
Va ʙe tardid, Parvardigorat hamon sikastnopaziri mehruʙon ast
Va ʙa rosti, [in] Qur'on furufiristodai Parvardigori cahonijon ast
Ruhu-l-amin [Caʙrail] onro furud ovardaast
Bar qalʙi tu [nozil kardaast], to ʙimdihanda ʙosi
[Qur'onro] Ba zaʙoni araʙii ravsan [nozil namud]
Va ʙe tardid, [ʙasorati nuzuli] on dar kitoʙhoi pesinijon [niz omada] ast
Ojo hamin nisona ʙarojason kofi nest, ki ulamoi Bani Isroil az [haqiqati] Qur'on ogohand
Va agar onro ʙar ʙa'ze az ƣajriaraʙho nozil mekardem
Va [pajomʙar] onro ʙarojason mexond, ʙa on imon nameovardand
[Ore] In guna on [kufru takziʙ]-ro dar dilhoi gunahgoron coj dodem
Ammo ʙa on imon nameovarand, to on goh ki azoʙi dardnokro ʙuʙinand
Pas, nogahon dar hole ki ʙexaʙarand, ʙa suroƣason meojad
Pas, [dar on hol] megujand: “Ojo muhlate [ʙaroi tavʙa] xohem dost?”
Ojo onon azoʙi moro ʙa sitoʙ xostorand
Ojo donisti, ki agar ononro solho [az zindagii dunjo] ʙahramand sozem
Sipas on ci ki ʙa onon va'da doda sudaast, ʙa suroƣasonn ʙijojad
In ʙahramandiason [az dunjo dar hangomi azoʙ] sude ʙarojason naxohad dost
Va Mo [sokinoni] hec sahrero halok nakardem, magar in ki husdordihandagone [az pajomʙaron] dostand
To ononro pand dihand va Mo hargiz sitamgor naʙudaem [ki itmomi huccat nakunem]
Va in Qur'onro sajotin nozil nakardaand
Onon na darxuri in korand va na tavonasro dorand
Be tardid, onon az sunidani [vahj] ʙarkanorand
Pas, [ej pajomʙar] hec ma'ʙudero ʙo Alloh taolo maxon, ki azoʙ xohi sud
Va xesovandoni nazdikatro [az azoʙi ilohi] ʙim deh
Va ʙo mu'minone, ki az tu pajravi kardaand, mehruʙon [-u furutan] ʙos
Pas, agar az [farmoni] tu sarpeci kardand, ʙigu: “Ba rosti, man az on ci mekuned, ʙezoram”
Va ʙar [Allohi] sikastnopaziri mehruʙon tavakkal kun
Hamon ki cun [ʙaroi iʙodat] ʙarmexezi, turo meʙinad
Va harakat [va nisastu ʙarxosti] turo mijoni sacdakunandagon [meʙinad]
Be tardid, U hamon sunavoi donost
Ojo ʙa sumo xaʙar diham, ki sajotin ʙar ci kase nozil mesavand
Bar har duruƣgui gunahkor
Onon sunidahoe [-ro, ki duzdona az malakut gus dodaand, ʙa codugaron va folgiron] ilqo mekunand va ʙestarason duruƣgu hastand
Va [Muhammad soir nest, zero] soironro gumrohon pajravi mekunand
Ojo nadidi, ki onon dar har laƣvu ʙehudae [hajronu] sargastaand
Va cizero megujand, ki [xud ʙa on e'tiqod nadorand va] amal namekunand

Magar kasone, ki imon ovardaand va korhoi soista ancom dodaand va Allohro ʙisjor jod kardaand va pas az on ki sitam didand, intiqom giriftand [va ʙo se'ri xud az islomu muslimin difo' namudand] va kasone, ki sitam kardand, ʙa zudi xohand donist, ʙa ci ʙozgastgohe ʙozmegardand
To, sin. In ojoti Qur'on va kitoʙe ravsangar ast
[Ki] Hidojatu ʙasorate ʙaroi mu'minon ast
[Hamon] Kasone, ki namoz ʙarpo medorand va zakot mepardozand va ʙa oxirat jaqin dorand
Dar haqiqat, kasone, ki ʙa oxirat imon nameovarand, a'molasonro ʙarojason orostaem, pas, [kurdilu] sargastaand
Ononand, ki azoʙi dardnok [dar pes] dorand va dar oxirat zijonkortarand
Va [ej pajomʙar] jaqinan, tu Qur'onro az pesgohi [Parvardigori] hakimi dono darjoft mekuni
[Jod kun az] Hangome ki Muso ʙa xonavodaas guft: “[Biisted] Man otase [az dur] didam. Ba zudi xaʙare az on ʙarojaton meovaram jo su'lai otase meovaram, to garm saved”
Pas, cun ʙa on [otas] rasid, nido doda sud, ki: “Muʙorak [va xucasta] ʙod on ki dar otas ast va har [faristae], ki peromuni on ast va poku munazzah ast Alloh taolo – Parvardigori cahonijon
Ej Muso, ʙa rosti, ki Manam Allohi sikastnopaziri hakim

Va asojatro ʙiafkan. Pas, cun [Muso] onro did, ki hamcun more [ʙo sur'at] mexazad, [az tars] pust kard va gurext va ʙoznagast. [Nido omad] “Ej Muso, natars! Pajomʙaron dar pesgohi Man hec tarse nadorand
Ammo kase, ki sitam kunad, on goh [pas az tavʙa] ʙadiro ʙa neki taʙdil namojad, [ʙidonad, ki] ʙe tardid, Man omurzandai mehruʙonam

Va dastatro dar gireʙon furu ʙar, [to] saped va ʙiduni ajʙ [-u ʙemorii pesi] xoric savad. [In mu'cizaest] Dar zumrai mu'cizoti nuhgona [ki ʙojad] ʙa suji Fir'avn va qavmas [ʙiʙari, caro ki] ʙe tardid, onon guruhe nofarmonand”
Pas, cun ojoti Mo ravsan [-u vozeh] ʙa sujason omad, guftand: “In codue oskor ast”
Va onhoro az rui sitamu sarkasi inkor kardand, dar hole ki dilhojason ʙa onho jaqin dostand; pas ʙingar, ki sarancomi mufsidon ci guna ʙuvad
Va ʙa rosti, ʙa Dovud va Sulajmon donise [azim] dodem va onon guftand: “Sitois az oni Alloh taolo ast, ki moro ʙar ʙisjore az ʙandagoni mu'mini xud ʙartari ʙaxsid”
Va Sulajmon az Dovud meros ʙurd va guft: “Ej mardum, [fahmi] zaʙoni parandagon ʙa mo omuxta suda va az har ciz ʙa mo [ʙahrae] dodaand. Be tardid, in fazle oskor [az coniʙi Parvardigor] ast”
Va sipohijoni Sulajmon – az cinnu ins va parandagon – nazdas gird omadand; on goh munazzam [va pajvasta dar kanori jakdigar] meraftand

[Onon ʙa rohi xud idoma dodand], to vaqte ʙa sarzamini murcagon [dar Som] rasidand. Murcae guft: "Ej murcagon, ʙa lonahoi xud ʙiraved, to Sulajmon va laskarijonas sumoro [nadida va] nadonista pojmol nakunand”

Pas [Sulajmon] az suxani on [murca] xandid va guft: «Parvardigoro, ʙa man tavfiq ʙideh, to sukri ne'matero, ki ʙar man va ʙar padaru modaram arzoni dostai ʙa coj ovaram va [joriam kun, to] kore soistae ancom diham, ki mojai xusnudiat gardad va ʙa rahmati xes maro dar cam'i ʙandagoni soistaat vorid kun”
Va [Sulajmon holi] parandagonro cujo sud va guft: «Ci sudaast, ki hudhudro nameʙinam? [Ojo coje pinhon suda] jo ƣoiʙ ast
[Pas, cun uro najoft guft] Hatman, ʙa saxti mucozot mekunam jo sarasro meʙuram, magar on ki daleli ravsane [ʙaroi ƣajʙatas] ʙijovarad»
Pas, dere napoid [ki hudhud omad] va guft: «Az cize ogohi joftaam, ki tu ʙad-on ogohi najoftai va az [sarzamini] Saʙa' ʙarojat xaʙare ʙoe'timod ovardaam
Man [on co] zanero joftaam, ki ʙar onon farmonravoi mekunad va [ʙa u] az har guna ne'mate dodaand va taxti ʙuzurge dorad
U va qavmasro didam, ki ʙa coji Alloh taolo ʙaroi xursed sacda mekunand va sajton korhoi [ʙotili] ononro ʙarojason orosta va esonro az roh [-i rost] ʙozdostaast, az in ru, hidojat namesavand»
[Sajton fireʙason dodaast] To ʙaroi Alloh taolo sacda nakunand [hamon ma'ʙude], ki nihoni osmonho va zaminro oskor mekunad va on ciro, ki pinhon mekuned va oskor mesozed, [hamaro] medonad
Alloh taolo, ki hec ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] cuz u nest, Parvardigori Arsi ʙuzurg ast
[Sulajmon] guft: «Xohem did, ki ojo rost guftai jo duruƣgui
In nomai maro ʙiʙar va ʙa suji onon ʙijafkan, on goh dur sav va [dar gusae ʙiist va] ʙingar, ki [dar ʙorai on] ci megujand»
[Malikai Saʙa'] guft: «Ej ʙuzurgon, nomai arcmande ʙa suji man afkanda sudaast
In [noma] az coniʙi Sulajmon ast va cunin ast: «Ba nomi Allohi ʙaxsandai mehruʙon
Bar man ʙartari macued va dar hole ki [az sirk dast ʙardosta va] taslim [-i haq va tavhid] sudaed, nazdi man ʙijoed»
[Malika] Guft: «Ej ʙuzurgon, nazari xudro dar in mavrid ʙigued, [caro ki] man hargiz ʙiduni huzur [-u masvarat]-i sumo dar ʙorai kore tasmim nagiriftaam»
Onon guftand: «Mo nerui ʙisjor va cangcujoni qudratmande dorem, vale ixtijor [-u tasmimi nihoi] ʙo tust. Pas, ʙarrasi kun, ki ci dasture ʙidihi»
[Malika] guft: «Be tardid, vaqte podsohon [ʙa unvoni foteh] voridi sahre mesavand, onro vajron [va taʙoh] mesozand va ʙuzurgonasro xoru zalil mekunand va raftorason hamvora cunin ʙudaast
Va man hadjae ʙarojason mefiristam va muntazir memonam, to ʙuʙinam, ki firistodagon ci posuxe [ʙarojam] meovarand»

Pas, cun [firistodai malika] nazdi Sulajmon omad, [Sulajmon] guft: «Ojo [mexohed] ʙo mol [-u sarvat] ʙa man kumak kuned? On ci Alloh taolo [az pajomʙari va donisu farmonravi] ʙa man ʙaxsida, az on cize, ki ʙa sumo ato karda ʙehtar ast, ʙalki sumoed, ki ʙa hadjai xes [va sarvathoi dunjo] sodmon mesaved
Nazdi onon ʙozgard [va ʙigu, ki] hatman, ʙo laskarijone ʙa sujason xohem omad, ki tavoni muqoʙila ʙo onro nadosta ʙosand va ʙe tardid, ononro az on [sarzamin] xoru zor ʙerun mekunem»
[On goh] Guft: «Ej ʙuzurgon, kadom jake az sumo, pes az on ki onon taslimsuda nazdi man ʙijojand, taxti uro ʙarojam meovarad?»
Jake az cinnijoni tanumand guft: «Pes az on ki az cojat ʙarxezi, man onro nazdat meovaram va hatman, ʙaroi ancomi in kor nerumandu aminam»

Kase, ki donise az kitoʙ [-i ilohi] dost, guft: «Pes az on ki casm ʙar ham ʙizani, onro ʙarojat meovaram». Pas, cun [Sulajmon] on [taxt]-ro nazdi xud mustaqar did, guft: «In az fazli Parvardigori man ast, to ʙiozmojadam, ki ojo sipos medoram jo nosiposi mekunam. Pas, har ki sipos guzorad, tanho ʙa sudi xes sipos meguzorad va har ki nosiposi kunad, pas, [ʙa zijoni xud nosiposi kardaast, caro ki] ʙe tardid, Parvardigoram ʙenijozi karim ast
[Sulajmon] guft: «Taxtasro [taƣjiri sakl dihed va] ʙarojas nosinos kuned, to ʙuʙinam, ojo [onro] tasxis medihad jo az kasonest, ki [asjo va amvoli xudro] namesinosand

Pas, cun [malikai Saʙa'] omad, [ʙa u] gufta sud: «Ojo taxti tu in guna ast?». [Malika] guft: «Gujo hamon ast». Va [Sulajmon guft] «In donis [va tavonoi] pes az in ʙa mo doda sudaast va hamvora farmonʙardor ʙudaem»
Va on ci ʙa coji Alloh taolo meparasted, uro [az imon va tavhid] ʙozdosta ʙud. Be tardid, [malika] az cumlai kofiron ʙud

Ba vaj gufta sud: «Ba sahn [-i qasr] vorid sav». Pas, hangome ki onro did, pindost, ki oʙi amiqest va coma az soqho [-i poi] xes ʙolo kasid [to az oʙ ʙigzarad. Sulajmon] Guft: «In [oʙ nest, ʙalki] koxe ast, ki ʙo [qitaoti ʙulur fars sudaast». [On goh uro ʙa tavhid da'vat kard. Malikai Saʙa'] Guft: «Parvardigoro, man ʙa xud sitam kardaam va [inak] hamrohi Sulajmon taslimi Alloh taolo – Parvardigori cahonijon – sudam»
Va ʙa suji qavmi Samud ʙarodarason Solehro firistodem, ki [ʙigujad] «Allohi jagonaro ʙiparasted», vale onon ʙa du guruh [mu'minon va kofiron] taqsim sudand va ʙa sitez pardoxtand
[Soleh] Guft: «Ej qavmi man, caro ʙa coji rahmat sitoʙzada xohoni azoʙi ilohi hasted? Caro az Alloh taolo omurzis namexohed? Bosad, ki mavridi rahmat qaror gired»
Onon guftand: «Mo tu va kasonero, ki hamrohat hastand, ʙa foli ʙad giriftaem». [Soleh] Guft: «Foli ʙadi sumo [va donisi on] nazdi Alloh taolo ast, ʙalki sumo guruhe hasted, ki ozmois mesaved»
Va dar sahr [-i Hicr] nuh nafar [sardastai guruh] ʙudand, ki dar on sarzamin ʙa fasod mepardoxtand va [hec] kori soistae namekardand

[Onon ʙa jakdigar] Guftand: «Ba Alloh taolo savgand jod kuned, ki ʙar u [Soleh] va xonavodaas saʙexun ʙizanem [va ononro ʙikusem]. On goh ʙa xunxohas ʙiguem: «Mo hangomi kustori xonavodaas hozir naʙudem va hatman, rost meguem»
Onon [ʙaroi qatli Soleh va pajravonas] najrange ʙa kor ʙurdand va Mo [ʙaroi noʙudii kofiron] niz najrange andesidem, dar hole ki onon namedonistand
Pas, ʙingar oqiʙati najrangason ci sud: mo hamai on afrod va qavmasonro noʙud kardem
Inak xonahojason ʙa sazoi sitame, ki kardand, [vajronu] tihi mondaast. Be gumon, dar in [kajfar] ʙaroi kasone, ki medonand [va imon dorand] nisonae [ʙaroi iʙrat giriftan] ast
Va kasonero, ki imon ovarda va parhezkor ʙudand, [hamrohi Soleh] nacot dodem
Va [jod kun az] Lut on goh ki ʙa qavmas guft: «Bo on ki [zisti va gunohi livotro] medoned, ojo [ʙoz ham] murtakiʙi in amali ʙesarmona mesaved
Ojo az ruji sahvat ʙa coji zanon ʙo mardon darmeomezed? Balki sumo guruhe nodoned»
